thread.title: BRIEF-Marathon Patent Group Announces Rescheduling Of Annual Meeting To March 7, 2018

title: BRIEF-Marathon Patent Group Announces Rescheduling Of Annual Meeting To March 7, 2018
text:
February 7, 2018 / 7:15 PM / in 22 minutes BRIEF-Marathon Patent Group Announces Rescheduling Of Annual Meeting To March 7, 2018 Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Marathon Patent Group Inc: 
* MARATHON PATENT GROUP ANNOUNCES RESCHEDULING OF ANNUAL MEETING TO MARCH 7, 2018 
* MARATHON PATENT GROUP INC - ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS SCHEDULED FOR FEBRUARY 8, 2018, WAS RESCHEDULED DUE TO LACK OF A “REQUISITE QUORUM” 
* MARATHON PATENT GROUP INC - DATE OF ANNUAL MEETING HAS BEEN RESCHEDULED FOR MARCH 7, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
